Agricultural and Environmental Sciences.1: Demonstrate competence in visual and written communication techniques.
Agricultural and Environmental Sciences.2: Apply communication concepts, theories and principles of critical thinking to real world issues facing agriculture and the environment.
Agricultural and Environmental Sciences.3: Understand diverse perspectives related to food, fuel, water, landscapes and people in Nebraska, nationally and globally.
Agricultural and Environmental Sciences.4: Communicate agricultural and environmental science information in lay language to targeted audiences.
